ChefName.description: The name of a Chef object.

VersionConstraint.description: A version constraint. A series of comma separated constraints, each of which may include VERSION, "> VERSION", "< VERSION", ">= VERSION", "<= VERSION", "= VERSION" and "~> VERSION".

AclPermission.description: An access control list for a single permission (create, read, update, grant or delete) for an object.

actors.description: The clients and users authorized for this permission on this Chef object.

groups.description: The groups authorized for this permission on this Chef object.

RunList.description: An ordered list of recipes to run.
